pr_title: Improves roles setup for user / tenant management...

timeline.message:
Ensures that the system-administrator profile is only shown and applied to system-tenant users.

Otherwise a "common" user could be made into a system administrator!
Removes a startup warning by removing an unused field.
Uses a more appropriate check to ensure that the current user belongs to the system tenant.

Permits user managers of the system tenant to also switch and manage tenants.

This is required to not have all user to be system administrators just for them
the create and manage tenants and users of those tenants.

Prevents a non-system-admin from becoming/selecting another user from the system tenant.

Otherwise an unwanted privilege escalation might happen. Therefore this is only granted to
users with "PERMISSION_MANAGE_SYSTEM_USERS" which have the highest security
privileges anyway...
